reviews.review_msg: seems crazy, but has good ideas. open to different ideas and is personable
whoa! if you want to know about grammar - buy a book! she loves the stuff, but trust me, you wont! she talked a lot about 199, kinda feels like i took it too! sweet lady, very happy.

Professor Rossell is one of the best English instructors. While Metrics and Prosody is not always an easy topic to learn, his easygoing style of teaching made it possible. It was difficult at times to see him in office hours only because the lineup to his office was down the hall!

Nicky is super accommodating and will offer you lots of help if you ask her any questions. Her grading for essays is up to a very high standard, so you have to put in lots of effort. Took this class with no interest in poetry and she made it super fun and easy to understand. I'd definitely recommend a course with her.

Nicky really cared about the class. She started every lecture with "mindfulness" and was very approachable outside of class and understanding of uncontrollable situations. She did take attendance every class but gave chances to make up tutorials if missed.

Nicky's one of the most caring profs I've had. i wouldn't say she's "sooo easy", but if you put in the effort its definitely doable to get a good grade. She makes herself super available for outside help. For my class we had 3 tests (pretty small ones, there was no final or midterm), a paper (pretty difficult. I got 70%), and a poetry portfolio

Nicky is a really caring and understanding person and is very accessible outside of class, but man is she a tough grader. Her tests are fair and marked accordingly, but she is pretty rough with the final paper. I was shocked with my mark--I am an English major and received the worst paper grade I've ever gotten in my life (I thought I did well!)
